title: Oceanview Estate Ideal for Residence, Retreats, or Boutique Use | Esparza
description:
Oceanview Estate Ideal for Residence, Retreats, or Boutique Use | Esparza
Property Layout & Key Facts
•	Bedrooms: 4
•	Bathrooms: 4 full bathrooms + outdoor shower
•	Total Construction: 5,540 sq ft (≈520 m²)
•	Lot Size: 1.23 acres (≈0.5 hectares)
•	Construction: Reinforced concrete
•	View: Panoramic Pacific Ocean, port, mountains, and valleys
•	Title: Fee-simple
•	Condition: Fully furnished and move-in ready
What’s Included
•	Fully furnished residence (furniture, appliances, linens, and essentials)
•	Open-concept living, dining, and kitchen layout
•	Granite countertops and hardwood cabinetry
•	Interior bar and outdoor bar by the pool
•	Large laundry room with washer and dryer
•	Infinity-edge swimming pool and separate jacuzzi
•	360-degree rooftop terrace with lighting
•	Multiple covered outdoor living areas
•	Landscaped gardens with privacy and no close neighbors
•	Secure indoor garage
•	Fiber optic internet, cable TV, municipal water, reliable electricity
•	Hot water throughout the entire property
Property Overview
This oceanview estate is set high above the Pacific coastline in Esparza, offering impressive, unobstructed views of the ocean, port activity, surrounding mountains, and valleys. The elevated position provides privacy, constant coastal breezes, and a sense of openness, while still being within practical driving distance to daily services and amenities.
The residence features a spacious open floor plan anchored by a large great room that integrates the living room, dining area, and kitchen. Cathedral ceilings reaching approximately 21.5 ft enhance natural light, airflow, and the connection between indoor and outdoor living. The layout is functional, comfortable, and designed for everyday living as well as entertaining.
Bedrooms & Bathrooms
The primary bedroom includes a king bed, walk-in closet, cathedral ceilings, an en-suite bathroom, and direct access to pool and terrace areas. Three additional bedrooms feature queen beds and air conditioning. The property includes four full bathrooms, one with exterior access for pool use, as well as a tropical outdoor shower.
Outdoor Living
Outdoor spaces are designed to fully embrace the Pacific views and sunsets. The infinity-edge pool measures approximately 48 ft x 15.5 ft (14.7 m x 4.75 m) and faces the ocean, complemented by a separate jacuzzi. A rooftop terrace of approximately 700 sq ft offers 360-degree views and functions well for gatherings, yoga sessions, workshops, or sunset activities. Multiple covered outdoor areas provide shaded space for dining and relaxation.
Location & Access
•	Located in Esparza, Central Pacific
•	Approx. 10-minute drive to excellent restaurants, including seafood restaurants and local dining
•	Approx. 20–25 minutes to the city of Puntarenas, offering:
•	Universities
•	Private schools
•	Gyms and fitness centers
•	Medical services
•	Supermarkets and everyday services
•	Approx. 10 minutes to nearby beaches
•	Approx. 40 minutes to Playa Blanca
•	Approx. 90 minutes to Juan Santamaría International Airport (SJO)
Use & Lifestyle Potential
The property works well as a primary residence for families seeking privacy, space, and a convenient yet secluded setting. It is equally suitable for retirees who value tranquility and views, as well as digital nomads looking for reliable connectivity and a quiet environment.
Daily life at the estate is closely connected to nature. The property features beautiful landscaped gardens surrounded by native flora and fauna, and it is common to see howler monkeys, white-faced monkeys, iguanas, and scarlet macaws on a regular basis. This natural environment enhances the sense of privacy and creates a peaceful, immersive setting while remaining close to services and dining.
In addition, the layout, outdoor areas, and privacy make the property well suited for small retreat or boutique hospitality concepts, including yoga retreats, wellness retreats, master classes, and workshops. With appropriate permitting and operational setup, the estate can be adapted into a bed and breakfast or boutique-style hospitality property, offering flexibility for owners seeking both lifestyle and income opportunities.
Investment & Expansion Potential
•	Suitable for full-time living, short-term rental, retreat, or boutique use
•	Additional lower portion of the property offers future construction potential with ocean views
•	Strong appeal for buyers seeking views, privacy, and flexible use scenarios
Legal & Ownership
•	Clear fee-simple title
•	Property taxes current
•	Foreign ownership permitted
•	No liens or encumbrances
